about.details:
Incorporated in 2000, Sheetal Cool Products Ltd is Gujrat based company involved in producing and processing of milk and milk products, snacks and bakery items. The product involve Ice-cream, milk & milk products, mango ras, lassi, curd, flavoured milk, masko, wafers, namkeen, fryums and bakery products. Company sells its product under the brand name 'Sheetal'.

Company has its manufacturing unit located at Amreli, Gujarat. Company has 22 employees (including skilled, semi-skilled) and 275 personnel on contract basis.

contactDetails.full_address: Sheetal Cool Products Ltd, G I D C Plot No. 78-79-80, Amreli 36560

faqs.question: What is the Sheetal Cool Products IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sheetal Cool Products IPO is a SME IPO of 3000000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹24.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹80 per share. The minimum order quantity is .

The IPO opens on October 16, 2017, and closes on October 18, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sheetal Cool Products IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sheetal Cool Products IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sheetal Cool Products IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sheetal Cool Products IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sheetal Cool Products IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sheetal Cool Products IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sheetal Cool Products IPO opens on October 16, 2017 and closes on October 18, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sheetal Cool Products IPO?
faqs.answer: Sheetal Cool Products IPO lot size and the minimum order quantity is not available at this time. Please check again later.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sheetal Cool Products IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sheetal Cool Products IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
